scripts.test: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others --success first "hugo server" "sleep 1 && blc http://localhost:1313 -ro"
scripts.watch:css: inotifywait -m -r -e modify,create,delete ./src/scss/ | while read NEWFILE; do node-sass src/scss/main.scss static/css/main.css --output-style compressed; done
scripts.build: node-sass src/scss/main.scss static/css/main.css --output-style compressed && hugo -d docs
